original_text:
Do not drag me away with the wicked,
    with those who do evil,
who speak cordially with their neighbors
    but harbor malice in their hearts.
korean_text: 악인과 악을 행하는 자들과 함께 나를 끌어내지 마옵소서 그들은 그 이웃에게 화평을 말하나 그들의 마음에는 악독이 있나이다

sentences.original_text: Do not drag me away with the wicked
who speak cordially with their neighbors
but harbor malice in their hearts
